targets.query:
current_value = from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -48h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["key"] == "nivel_apa") 
  |> group(columns: ["key", "station"])
  |> last()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Current"})

min_value = from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -48h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["key"] == "nivel_apa") 
  |> group(columns: ["key", "station"])
  |> min()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Min"})

max_value = from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -48h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["key"] == "nivel_apa") 
  |> group(columns: ["key", "station"])
  |> max()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Max"})

avg_value = from(bucket: "my-bucket")
  |> range(start: -48h)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["key"] == "nivel_apa") 
  |> group(columns: ["key", "station"])
  |> mean()
  |> rename(columns: {"_value": "Avg"})

first_join = join(
  tables: {current_value, min_value},
  on: ["key", "station"],
  method: "inner"
)
 
second_join = join(
  tables: {first_join, max_value},
  on: ["key", "station"],
  method: "inner"
)

third_join = join(
  tables: {second_join, avg_value},
  on: ["key", "station"],
  method: "inner"
)


result = third_join
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
    r with
    Station: r.station
  }))

final_result = result
  |> keep(columns: ["Station","Current", "Min", "Max", "Avg"])
  |> yield(name: "final_result")
